comment: This is the config file for the bot, any changes can be made via pull request, you must be a valid member of the discord to make a PR. I will review all of them and who sent them, so nothing SUPER racist or homophobic (Im talking to you ME IS ME and Milk) a little is okay as long as its in the spicy section.

tame: HELLDIVERS! OUR BROTHEREN NEED US, JOIN THE VC!!!
mild: JOIN UP DUMBASSES. THE HELLDIVERS NEED YOU!!
spicy: A CALL HAS STARTED BITCHES, JOIN THE FUCKING VC AND HOP ON!!!!
